the car seat three times in an hour yes sunlight still removes stains from my cloth diapers and we re well into solids sunlight is great for many stains not just baby poo honestly wish known about janet lansbury and the tenets of respectful parenting mainly because it would have eased lot of my worries stress around whether was doing enough doing things right etc she advocates for giving your baby freedom from the get go like allowing him to self soothe not cry it out obviously but to wait and observe what is actually happening before you swoop in and rescue him it about slowing down in general and recognizing how much awareness your child has right from the beginning and allowing them the agency to do as much as possible as early as possible discovered her when was seeking answers for an unruly toddler and her help has been seriously key there but then having this info for my second baby has been amazing too at just months my littlest can play independently for an hour at time and we re communicating he does talk but tuned into his facial expressions and mannerisms enough so that we honestly do communicate throughout the day whatever you do hope you can also remember to
